content:
Enable Broadcast Slack Messages
To let incident managers send disruptive in-app notifications when an incident occurs.

Create a Broadcast Topic for Broadcast Slack Messages
First create at least one broadcast topic. When an incident occurs, users can then send broadcast Slack messages to Slack channels based on a broadcast topic.

Assign a Broadcast Topic to a Slack Channel
Assign a broadcast topic to one or more Slack channels. Incident teams can then send broadcast Slack messages to a channel in Slack based on a broadcast topic.

Create a Custom Broadcast Slack Message Template
Create custom broadcast Slack message templates to send customized messages that meet your business needs.
title: Setting up Broadcast Messages in Service Cloud for Slack
